column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " I think I like " the man with a sword for a hand " better . "
#Text=Toph says : " Water Tribe slumber parties must stink . "
#Text=Katara says : " No , wait !
#Text=" Katara says : " No , it happened to Mom .
#Text=" Katara says : " One winter when Mom was a girl , a snowstorm buried the whole village for weeks .
#Text=A month later , Mom noticed she had n't seen her friend Nini since the storm .
#Text=So Mom and some others went to check on Nini 's family .
#Text=When they got there , no one was home .
#Text=Just a fire flickering in the fireplace .
#Text=While the men went out to search , Mom stayed in the house .
#Text=When she was alone , she heard a voice .
#Text=" It 's so cold and I ca n't get warm ! "
#Text=Mom turned and saw Nini standing by the fire .
#Text=She was blue like she was frozen .
#Text=Mom ran outside for help , but when everyone came back , Nini was gone .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where 'd she go ?
#Text=" Katara says : " No one knows .
#Text=Nini 's house stands empty to this day , but sometimes , people see smoke coming up from the chimney , like little Nini is still trying to get warm .
#Text=" Toph says : " Wait !
#Text=Guys , did you hear that ?
#Text=I hear people under the mountain .
#Text=And they 're screaming .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Pfft !
#Text=Nice try .
#Text=" Toph says : " No , I 'm serious .
#Text=I hear something .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're probably just jumpy from the ghost stories ... " Toph says : " It just ... stopped .
#Text=" Aang says : " All right , now I 'm getting scared .
#Text=" Hama says : " Hello , children .
#Text=" Hama says : " Sorry to frighten you .
#Text=My name is Hama .
#Text=You children should n't be out in the forest by yourselves at night .
#Text=I have an inn nearby .
#Text=Why do n't you come back there for some spiced tea and warm beds ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yes , please .
#Text="
